category.name: Business Modeler
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ASSIGNED_ITEM_REV_MODIFIABLE
preference.preference_description: Determines whether an automatically generated Item Revision ID can be modified by users after it has been generated. Valid Values: 0 - When the Item Revision ID is generated by clicking the Assign button, the system generated Item Revision ID cannot be modified by the user. 1 - When the Item Revision ID is generated by clicking the Assign button, the system generated Item Revision ID can be modified by the user.
